testcase = input()
for i in range(0, testcase):
	n, q = map(int, raw_input().split())
	s = raw_input()
	for j in range(0, q):
		c, t = raw_input().split()
		if(t == "even"):
			if(s.count(c)%2 == 0):
				print "yes"
			else:
				print "no"
		else:
			if(s.count(c)%2 == 1):
				print "yes"
			else:
				print "no"
